name: ASHAMANT FOUNDATION
briefDescription: We have created an organization named ASHAMANT FOUNDATION, DARFAL (SINA), TAL-MADHA, DIST-SOLAPUR, STATE-MAHARASHTRA on non profit for the Agricultural Farmers Group, Drought, Children Rights, Environments, Human Rights, Women’s Empowerment, Food Security for poor people and famine relief etc. which is run by “NAREGA” in Solapur, Sangali and Osmanabad District. We have 40 people expert staff and all over Maharashtra Network.
